snippet.title: Attack of the Earthlings - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Web Page: http://teamjunkfish.com/game/attack-o...
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AttackoftheE...
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/teamjunkfish

---

Attack of the Earthlings is a turn-based strategy game in which you control a race of aliens fending off a deadly invasive species – humans – who have landed their massive space-drill on your house.

Combining turn-based combat and stealth in an off-beat narrative campaign, players will fight their way up the afore mentioned space-drill, consume feeble humans, evolve their forces and, at one point, attend a birthday party. 

Coming to a planet near you, late Summer 2017.
